M

main(String[]) - Static method in class it.uniba.main.AppMain
* This is the main entry of the application.
Match - Class in it.uniba.game
Class representing a chess match
Class type : < Control >

Responsibilities :
Knows :
The current status of the ChessBoard Captured pieces by each player The history of the moves The current player The last long move done by a pawn Does :
Parsifies the move given an input string Establishes whether the move is a Castling, a Capture or a simple one Checks whether the established move is legal and not ambiguous Executes the move, if legal Updates the status of Rooks and Kings in order to say if the former can be captured en passant, or the latter can execute Castling Records the captures done by the players Updates the color of the current player according to the flow of the game
Match() - Constructor for class it.uniba.game.Match
Constructor of the class Match It initializes the currentPlayer to WHITE and creates a new ChessBoard with the pieces at the initial position of a classic chess game.
Move - Class in it.uniba.game
Class representing a generic move converted from the string inserted by the user.
Move(Piece, Coordinates, Coordinates, boolean) - Constructor for class it.uniba.game.Move
Constructor for the class Move.
Move.Castling - Enum in it.uniba.game
Enumerated type used to represent the castling of the move.
